scripts.filter: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const walk=(dir)=>{let results=[];const list=fs.readdirSync(dir);list.forEach((file)=>{file=path.join(dir,file);const stat=fs.statSync(file);if(stat.isDirectory())results=results.concat(walk(file));else if(/\.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif|webp|svg)$/i.test(file)&&stat.size>300*1024)results.push({file,size:(stat.size/1024).toFixed(2)+'KB'});});return results;};console.table(walk('.'));"
